law.text: There may be a provision as follows: "Conformity with State Statutes: Any provision of this policy which, on its effective date, is in conflict with the statutes of the state in which the insured resides on such date is hereby amended to conform to the minimum requirements of such statutes."
law.history: Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 17, sec. 26, effective June 18, 1970.
